content: shades of yarn starting with the lightest color color a and ending with the darkest color color e watch this westknits video to assist with carrying yarn along the i-cord edge https //youtu be/--csadqbnw4 begin with color a on its own until you have approximately 25g remaining stripe colors a & b together for 6 row each 1 pattern repeat of row 1 6 with each color carry the yarns along the edge while striping colors once you have finished color a break color a and continue working with color b on its own work with color b on its own until you have approximately 25g remaining stripe colors b & c together for 6 row each 1 pattern repeat of row 1 6 with each color carrying the yarns along the edge while striping colors once you have finished color b break color b and continue working with color c on its own until you have approximately 25g remaining stripe colors c & d together for 6 row each 1 pattern repeat of row 1 6 with each color until you have finished color c break color c and continue working with color d on its own until you have approximately 25g remaining stripe colors d & e together for 6 row each 1 pattern repeat of row 1 6 with each color until you have finished color d break color d and continue working with color e on its own until you have approximately 10g of color e remaining bind off with color e after completing pattern repeat row 2 © 2024 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 4 photography by westknits version 1 finishing using e bobble all sts on the next rs row using an i-cord bobble watch this westknits video to assist with the i-cord bobble https //youtu be/uugac-6rety i-cord bobble *k2 k2tog tbl sl3 sts onto left needle repeat from * until 6 total sts remain break yarn leaving an 8″ / 20cm tail place the first 3 sts onto your right needle and the last 3 sts onto your left needle with the purl bumps facing each other and both needles pointing to the right graft the remaining 6 sts together watch this westknits video to assist with grafting the i-cord sts together https //youtu be/7yn6-ih2p_m weave in ends and wet block the finished wrap to smooth the fabric watch this westknits video to assist with weaving in the ends https //youtu be/33nkcgk27rq © 2024 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 5 photography by westknits version 1
